thread.section_title: Ace Jewelers Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Ace Jewelers | www.acejewelers.com
thread.title: Mhel R
thread.title_full: Ace Jewelers Beoordeeld door Mhel R

author: Mhel R
title: Mhel R
text: Ordered a watch online and chose the gift option as it is for my wife. The process was quick; they received my order and processed it the same day, mailed me the tracking number. I would've gotten it in 3 days if it wasn't for the delay in customs clearance and slow response from local UPS which is not Ace's fault. But anyway, the gift wrap and presentation was so nicely done my wife almost didn't want to damage the wrapping paper. The watch is an Omega (for her birthday) which is a little upgrade from a Citizen she was hinting at before Christmas. Her reaction was priceless! Thank you Ace Jewelers for the excellent service!
